page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT MUSIC THEATRE
page.content: {St.Stephen-School-Band}founded-1974 by Frank Moore continues with M.S Burley head of music and E.Ely visiting brass tutor.Present 38 children members of band.Band played for opening of new St.Austell Market and gave concert at Lanjeth Village Hall.Players also are members of other local bands. {St.Stephen-School Operatic Society} flourishing since 1978.Most recent production "Austell and the Devil" by Rigby/Burley originally composed for Primary Schools Festival,considered unsuitable.Too controversial.Play ran four nights at St.Stephen-in-Brannel School.Other productions included Oliver,Joseph,The Boyfriend and Rats. {Primary Schools Festival}has run for many years.1985 production, Joseph.Joined Secondary/Primary choirs {St.Stephen Village Annual Panto}in Feb Dick Whittington with local residents
